author: ryanleeschneider
content: I've asked in a couple venues but I don't think I got a definitive response: what should we do w/ our existing Goerli Clique validator once the merge completes?  Shut it down?  If so, should we wait until X epochs/slots/blocks later "just in case"?

author: protolambda
content: Keeping it online shouldn't stop the Merge from happening. If you are running older software that does not have the TTD then it may stay producing blocks, not sure what you run. I'd be interested in how many peers it retains after the upgrade. Many testnet users probably forget to update / prepare for Merge.

author: ryanleeschneider
content: Ya it's running a pre-TTD version, but I could definitely upgrade it to latest if that'd help (sans CL I assume) the Merge go smoother.
